title: Prime Lucian?
body: So, I was playing in bots. The Bot Lucian was called "Prime Lucian", but had a large blue block as no artwork existed for whatever this "skin" was. Though, it does look like it was just supposed to be the name for his Red Chroma Skin.

replies.body: Heyo, Azure KayZ! Thanks for the report! I suspect that this is part of Blucian's plot to turn everything [blue](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=68ugkg9RePc). Nonetheless, we are aware of his plot and this bug, so this should be fixed in the future--barring that nothing crazy happens on our end. In the meantime, hold off against Blucian's Bluepocalypse plan while we get our counter-plan out to stop it!
Yeah, I've seen this. I'm not sure if it's a bug with Lucian Chroma or supposed to be there.
I had the same thing happen to me this morning. There might have been a change since that was before the Chroma packs were available in the store,  but I kind of doubt it.
